title: The Swamp Fights Back # 989 (Ep 989)
description:
In this episode I address the real reason Trump gave the Attorney General declassification authority. I also address continued efforts by the left to silence conservative dissent. I discuss the complete failure of Obamacare to meet its own measures of success. Finally, I recognize the accomplishments of Bill Buckner. News Picks:No, that “drunk” Pelosi video wasn’t “doctored.”



Bill Barr’s coming declassification has the liberal media in full meltdown mode.



Didn’t liberals tell us that ER usage would go down under Obamacare?



Liberals love using language wars in the debate over abortion.



Here’s what the CIA is really hiding?



Here are the facts on arming school teachers.



Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
